price: I uništili smo prije narod Nuhov: to, zaista, bijaše narod najokrutniji i najobjesniji,
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā
